website_summaries.verdict: A versatile chart you can adapt for calendar, scheduling, phonics, or other flexible use.
pros: Seven full rows hold small letter cards, large word cards, days of the week
Rods at top and bottom help to hold it straight
cons: Green color may not be the best with home decor

website_summaries.verdict: Small but sturdy, this brightly colored pocket chart gets students' attention and holds full rows of cards.
pros: Full-row pockets hold most types of cards
Rods through the top and bottom ensure it hangs nicely
cons: Smaller than other options on the market
Green color may not blend well with other classroom materials

customer_reviews.title: Best Pocket Chart I Own
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. Most pocket charts are flimsy and thin making the clear pockets loose and sloppy. This one is of excellent quality. It's thick and sturdy. The clear coverings are just as thick and there is nothing sloppy about it. This is the best pocket chart I own. I will be replacing my others with these as well. Not to mention, it's adorable! Love the design and color - adds a bit of fun to the classroom. Thank you for making a lasting pocket chart! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda G.

customer_reviews.title: Lime green- not neon! Great for classroom calendar!
customer_reviews.text: I used the TCR chalkboard brights the past three years, but changing themes so needed a green one for calendar now! Perfect for my cactus classroom! Comes nicely packaged and not bent. Rod at the bottom and three holes at top to hang. Picture shows a bright neon green, but it’s more of a lime green.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Needed for Homeschooling or Classroom set up
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Homeschooling Set up. I’m currently using this for Sight Word Wall for my 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Junk... keep looking
customer_reviews.text: This is absolute junk. It looks horrible and the way that it is folded for delivery the pocket chart has an awful crease that will not allow it to lay flat. Do not buy! I never write reviews, but with the start of the school year approaching I am now falling behind because I have to return and purchase a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to have to use for Virtual Teaching
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use for virtual teaching in my home. However, opened box saw a shadow of something moving in box. Moved the green chart out box to see what moved in box. Inside box was a live roach...yuck! I threw the box with the roach and along with the chart out immediately the same day. Was not expecting that. Never did use the chart due to the bug inside the box upon opening nope!
customer_reviews.author: Cranberry

customer_reviews.title: So nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the burlap. Great versatility for whatever you might want to use it for. I'm using it for my classroom calendar, and it's just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: othentic

customer_reviews.title: It works great for what I needed it for
customer_reviews.text: I bought the green one because that's my daughters favorite color. Its huge, much bigger than I thought it was gonna be but it fits what I wanted it for perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great Classroom Tool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a teacher at one of the local schools. She uses it in her classroom to display the site words of the week. The product is exactly as described and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Womelsdorf

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for over a month. It still will not lay flat on mu board. There is a crease that makes it difficult to slide my notecards in, that came from how they folded it.
customer_reviews.author: SHAY

customer_reviews.title: I bought this and it is terrible. I knew it was plastic and that was ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it is terrible. I knew it was plastic and that was alright. The stitching was terrible. The pockets weren't even, and the stitching was very poor. There were also tiny holes for no reason on it. It looks cute in the picture, but don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute pocket chart. It’s not real burlap, it’s plastic but it looks nice
customer_reviews.author: erica ahern

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cute, cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute in my classroom! Goes really well with my country Farmhouse theme. It's a little on the small size, although I was aware of the size when I made the purchase. Still worth it! I bought 2.
customer_reviews.author: SheShopsAmazonnotStores

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Great size and deep pockets! Loved using this for centers!
customer_reviews.author: Daniele Tressel

customer_reviews.title: Cute and just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I am doing a burlap/rustic theme in my classroom this year and this pocket chart is just what I was looking for. I am going to use it for calendar. Simple, super thick and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job well
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for our homeschool room to hold spelling words. Works like you would expect it to work. Very cute too!
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the pocket chart! So cute in my classroom! Super fast shipping! Thanks so very much!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy material; holds perfectly well on my wall for my students to see- bought the large and small size because of how simple and lovely it was! Quality is great as well!
customer_reviews.author: txdancer22

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: I attached this pocket chart to the wall with command strips at the top and it stayed flat.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Not actual burlap...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap printed vinyl and not actual burlap like other brands I’ve purchased. Disappointed since it cost almost double and it was a good size I was looking to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I use it for my focus wall/standards. They packaged it oddly and bent the rod at the bottom, but it isn't noticeable when hung (I tried straightening it).
customer_reviews.author: Ryndi

customer_reviews.title: love it!!
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size and I absolutely love the color!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Winters

customer_reviews.title: Cute pocket chart
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Will work perfectly for my spelling word wall.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Pocket chart rows were sewn on crooked so everything looks like it's leaning. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: calvin i young

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for classroom
customer_reviews.text: Love the material of these! They are plastic but definitely a thick material that will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I was looking for. It is durable and easy for my students to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Coker

customer_reviews.title: Farmhouse Style Classroom
customer_reviews.text: I cannot wait to use this burlap bulletin pocket chart in my farmhouse classroom.
customer_reviews.author: DebbieC8kes

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love my pocket chart. Perfect for my morning centers.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Meza

customer_reviews.title: Great chart
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy. Well made. Can’t wait to use it in my classroom!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great chart!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy. Well made. Can’t wait to use it in my classroom!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M. Wilson

product_meta.title: Teacher Created Resources Lime Polka Dots 7 Pocket Chart (20741), 28 x 28 in
product_meta.description: These lightweight and durable pocket charts feature colorful designs and hang easily from sturdy, metal grommets. The non-porous surface is easy to clean and can be wiped-down or sprayed with disinfectant to help prevent the spread of germs. Measures 28" x 28".
feature_bullets: Use sentence strips, flashcards and more
Can be wiped-down or sprayed with disinfectant to help prevent spread of germs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars22 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
